name: Mr. Mime
author: Noriko Hotta
flavor_text: Its fingertips emit a peculiar force field that hardens air to create an actual wall.

poke_power.name: Trick Reveal
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have both you and your opponent reveal your hands. This power can’t be used if Mr. Mime is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
